summary: An Ordinance approving the assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 1821, for the improvement of Eighth Avenue, in the City of Seattle, from Westlake Avenue to Denny Way, by constructing thereon curbs and gutters, wooden sidewalks eight (8) feet in width, railing where necessary, providing for the necessary surface drainage, and making connections to the existing improvements, under Ordinance No. 19013, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against each parcel and lot of land and part thereof shown in said roll, and providing for the collection thereof.
